vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Μαθθάν (Rec. Ματθ-, see: Μαθθαῖος), ὁ indecl. (Heb. מַתָּן),
Matthan: Mat.1:15.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, first mentioned at Mat.1.15;
son of: Eleazar (G1648);
father of: Jacob (G2384)
§ Matthan, "gift"
Matthan, (Proper name), indeclinable, Mt. 1:15 (2x)*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
馬但 这个陽性名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "禮物"
耶穌的一位祖先 (太 1:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
马但 这个阳性名词在希伯来文的意思是 "礼物"
耶稣的一位祖先 (太 1:15)
